Notes.Text:
This update for FastCGI fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-23016: Fixed integer overflow in FastCGI fcgi2 library (bsc#1243325)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: FastCGI fcgi2 (aka fcgi) 2.x through 2.4.4 has an integer overflow (and resultant heap-based buffer overflow) via crafted nameLen or valueLen values in data to the IPC socket. This occurs in ReadParams in fcgiapp.c.
